snippet: Russian emergency workers frantically plucked bodies from the freezing Sea of Okhotsk after a refrigerated trawling ship sank off Russia’s Far East, killing at least 56 of a crew of 132.
lead_paragraph: Russian emergency workers frantically plucked bodies from the freezing Sea of Okhotsk after a refrigerated trawling ship sank off Russia’s Far East, killing at least 56 of a crew of 132.

headline.main: Russia: Death Toll Rises in Ship Disaster
headline.print_headline: Europe; Russia: Death Toll Rises in Ship Disaster
